hdr-38606.def: Percentage of the population with a deprivation score of at least 33 percent.
hdr-38606.name: Population in multidimensional poverty
hdr-38606.source: HDRO and OPHI calculations based on data on household deprivations in health, education, and standard of living from various surveys listed in column 1 using the methodology described in Technical note 5 (http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/mpi2021_technical_notes.pdf).
hdr-38606.dataset: HDRO and OPHI calculations based on data on household deprivations in health, education, and standard of living from various surveys listed in column 1 using the methodology described in Technical note 5 (http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/mpi2021_technical_notes.pdf).
